name.thai: กุ้งผัดสะตอ

metaTitle.en: Goong Pad Sator Recipe | Authentic Thai main dish
metaTitle.nl: Goong Pad Sator Recept | Authentieke Thaise main dish

metaDescription.en: Learn about Goong Pad Sator (กุ้งผัดสะตอ) - Prawns stir-fried with stink beans...
metaDescription.nl: Leer over Goong Pad Sator (กุ้งผัดสะตอ) - Garnalen geroerbakt met stinkbonen...

enhanced_description: Goong Pad Sator is a beloved hearty and satisfying main course from southern Thailand that with a pleasant kick of heat. Prawns stir-fried with stink beans. This easy recipe takes about 15 minutes to prepare and represents the authentic flavors of Southern Thai cuisine features intense spices, seafood, and coconut-based curries. The combination of prawns, stink beans, shrimp paste creates a harmonious blend that has made this dish a favorite among locals and visitors alike. Perfect for those seeking reasonably priced authentic Thai cuisine.

cooking_method.steps_overview: Preparing Goong Pad Sator requires attention to detail and proper timing. The key is to balance all flavors while maintaining the texture of each ingredient. Traditional methods passed down through generations ensure authentic taste.
cooking_tips: Use fresh prawns for best results
Adjust spice level to your preference
Taste and adjust seasoning before serving

cultural_significance.origin_story: Goong Pad Sator has been a staple of southern Thai cuisine for generations, reflecting the region's unique culinary traditions and local ingredients.
cultural_significance.cultural_importance: This dish represents the heart of southern Thai cooking, showcasing the balance and harmony that Thai cuisine is famous for worldwide.

variations.description: Plant-based version using tofu or mushrooms

serving_suggestions.presentation: Served on a plate in traditional Thai style
serving_suggestions.eating_etiquette: Enjoyed with fork and spoon as per Thai custom

health_benefits: Rich in Thai herbs and spices
